name: Rob & Cas
description:
This game is about two characters, a painter and his drawn figure that came to life, who try to save paintings by working together. Said paintings are haunted by colour-eating entities, which threaten the painter to lose all his work before his premiere. Each character is played by an individual player, making this a co-op multiplayer game.
The painter can alter scenarios with his brush (or other art tools) to create bridges, barricades, portals etc. to assist the drawn figure. He does so by using a pointing device (ex: mouse) and using different colors for different effects.

The drawn figure moves through the painting, working against evil creatures which also came alive trying to erase the painting. This character has basic 2-dimensional movement, is affected by gravity and can collect key-items within the painting which the painter cannot get by himself. Those items aid the drawn figure to combat the colour-eating entities or to enhance his capabilities (higher jumping, faster running).

How to play:
The mouse user can draw either a line, a triangle or a circle. If the shape is drawn correctly, it will stay and can be interacted with Cas.
